p: The essential oil was obtained by hydro distillation method on aerial parts of L. officinale and the product had yellow-white color with unique odor. Also the yield (v/w%) of essential oil was equal to 2.8%. Identified compounds of L. officinale essential oil have been shown in Table 1. The predominate compounds were α-terpinenyl acetate (52.85%), β-phellandrene (10.26%), neocnidilide (10.12%) and (Z)-ligustilide (6.22%), ( Fig. 1).
